name: Happy Ducks!
description:
The game "Happy Ducks!" is about an old men named Patrick who have to feed ducks.

You can fish fishes to sell them at the Fishery to get money.

Buy bread with the money you earned and start feeding ducks!

If you made enough ducks happy, the Fishery will gift you his boat and the old Patrick will find peace within the light surrounded by ducks.

This is my first submission to a Game Jam, I hope you guys like it.

Greets Korhan
